title: Competition: Win Stephen Dale Petit Tickets
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/stedale.jpg "stedale")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/1809-competition-win-stephen-dale-petit-tickets/attachment/stedale)

Fresh from a superb Glastonbury slot on the newly introduced Blues & Jazz stage, British-adoptee guitar genius Stephen Dale Petit will embark upon a full UK tour, in support of his new album _The Crave_, released on July 26th through Universal Records. _The Crave_ is the sensational follow up to 2008’s critically acclaimed _Guitararama_, which took the prestigious title of Guitar Magazine’s Album of the Year. Having previously played alongside many of the greats such as **Ringo Starr**, **Eric Clapton** and **Joe Strummer,** as well as last year doing a full UK tour with **Mick Taylor**, there is no doubting **Petit’s** influence upon the world of blues music.

Following on from this_**, Crack in the Road**_ are delighted to be able to announce a competition to win a pair of tickets for one of his UK tour dates, which kicks off in Bristol on July 15th. To be eligible for a chance to win this fantastic prize, simply send a blank email with the subject “Stephen Dale Petit” to **crackintheroad@gmail.com**. The competition will close at 12 midday on July 12th and the winner will be announced an hour later, and will be given two tickets for their choice of which UK gig they would like to attend.

As well as entering this magnificent competition, make sure to check out **Stephen Dale Petit’s** new album, titled _The Crave_, released on July 26th via Universal Music. Also head across to his brand new website for sneak previous of the record.

July 15 : Bristol, O2 Academy

July 16 : Oxford, O2 Academy

July 17 : Birmingham, O2 Academy

July 19 : Liverpool, O2 Academy

July 20 : Glasgow, O2 ABC

July 21 : Newcastle, O2 Academy

July 29 :Islington, O2 Academy

[Check Out His Official Website](www.stephendalepetit.com)
